li.a: Resources for Families During the Coronavirus

img.title: Littlefork-Big Falls School
img.br:
Located 10 miles south of the Canadian border on the Little Fork River in the city of Littlefork, Minnesota, Littlefork-Big Falls School is a Pre-K through 12th grade public school, serving a diverse population of approximately 300 plus students.
Our school is filled with dedicated teachers who know every student, a variety of state-caliber sports and extracurricular activities in which to excel, a safe environment, and very supportive communities. Students have access to the latest technologies; they learn using iPads, Smartboards, and computer labs that are open for research and assignments. College credit is offered on site, as well as the availability to take Honors Online courses.
Littlefork-Big Falls students continue to perform well both academically and athletically. L-BF has been nationally recognized by U.S. News & World Report as a Bronze school numerous years!
We hope you find our website to be a great resource for learning about our school, and a way to access the information that you need!
